â€œoh HELL nahâ€ I exclaimed. The spy guys looked at eachother, and they signaled someone to come in! I look at the door and...

WTFğŸ¤¬ğŸ¤¬ğŸ¤¬ ITS THE CHEETO PUFF GOD! I blankly stare at him.

â€œWAIT!â€ I hear a voice call out. I look over at the opened door and..

ğŸ˜¦â˜ºï¸ğŸ¥°ğŸ¥µğŸ¥µ ITS DADDY ANON! I yell for his help:

attributes.review:
When the app it took a whole day to download this is one of many problems I had with this app. After it finally downloaded I opened the app and it started playing Gooba by 6ix9ine. After that my phone shut off for a week. When I got my phone fixed it had lots of glitches. The app had a customer service number (830-476-5664). They where absolutely no help they told me to put my phone in water for 2 hours and then put toothpaste in the speaker I obviously didnâ€™t do anything they told me. Please call the number and fix the problems that they had.  
BLACK LIVES MATTER and ABOLISH ICE 
                      Donâ€™t get this app

attributes.title: the worst app EVER !!!!

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! It took so long to download and my phone literally wasnâ€™t working while it was downloading! Once it downloaded, it was super slow and a bunch of ads kept popping up when I tried to go somewhere on the app! Whenever I try to text the number 88022, it would never work and the texts were green! I personally like the color blue and the green was just offensive! Also the president wasnâ€™t actually responding like the number advertised. It was some stupid bot telling me that I was the only one getting the messages when everybody else was getting the same messages as i was! I just wanted to feel special and so I deleted the app and I will never be downloading it again #settleforbiden2020

I wish I could give this app 0 stars but that sadly isnâ€™t and option.
